awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 8 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: The story of the civil rights heroine whose refusal to obey racial bus segregation was just one of her acts in her fight for justice.
plot: The story of the civil rights heroine whose refusal to obey racial bus segregation was just one of her acts in her fight for justice.
title: The Rosa Parks Story
